Description_lang: Blasts a target for $s1 Shadowflame damage, gaining $s3% critical strike chance on targets that have $s4% or less health.|cFFFFFFFFRestores ${$245731s1/10} Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within $d.|r
AuraDescription_lang: If the target dies and yields experience or honor, Shadowburn restores ${$245731s1/10} Soul Shard and refunds a charge.
